pages.text: It is bad to always eat rotten meat,flesh is delicious whatever how you cook it. Miss Rumia can't stand the temptation of flesh, so she recommend this to me.

beef, youkai think beef is good to eat raw$(br)Scallion, raw scallion will provide special flavor$(br)salt, or it will taste like paper$(br)You need fire and barbecue net to cook, but do not make it overcooked
